title: LP
body:
Why am I only gaining 11 LP for a win in ranked. Yet losing 23 for a loss ?
The win : 5/4/17 Morgana
The loss : 22/8/7 Jinx

replies.body: Having the same issue started the post had over 300 views and no one would reply and guy called albey reply and said that you have to win like 12 straight. I find this hard to believe.
